1459850.name: Microjob
1459850.description:
Microjob is an interactive language learning game.
It teaches words through objects / pictures, daily conversations with simple dialogues, and actions with tiny tasks.
The game also aims to teach habits to integrate immigrants into new cultures easily in future versions.
It's main purpose to give you courage about your first real life listening and speaking experience by putting enough vocabulary and conversations.

Current Features

  • Vocabulary training with objects
  • Conversations
  • Simple Tasks
  • Random task assignments
  • Speeches of words and dialogues
  • VR support
  • Maps; Home, Office, Town, City, Taxi
  • Controller support

Upcoming Features

  • Habits; Getting in a line, Waste sorting
  • New locations; Cafe, Supermarket, Public transport, Hotel, Party, Post office, Restaurant, Shopping center, Cinema
  • More dialogues
  • Leveling system from entry to intermediate
  • Dialogue maker for players and contributors
  • SteamOS support
  • Steam Achievements
  • New languages
  • Steam Cloud for saved games
  • Food orders
  • Random phone calls
  • Emergency situations
  • Flirting
  • Animals

Currently Available Languages
Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish
